org.sensorhub.api.sensor

Interface ISensorManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IModuleManager<ISensorModule<?>>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SensorManagerImpl

    public interface ISensorManager
extends IModuleManager<ISensorModule<?>>

    Management interface for sensors connected to the system

    Copyright (c) 2010

    Since:
    Nov 5, 2010
    Author:
    Alexandre Robin

    • Method Detail

      • findSensor

        ISensorModule<?> findSensor(String uid)
        Helper method to find a sensor by its global UID (instead of its localID)
        Parameters:
        uid - global unique identifier of sensor (= SensorML UID)
        Returns:
        sensor module instance

      • getConnectedSensors

        List<ISensorModule<?>> getConnectedSensors()
        Helper method to get the list of connected sensors only
        Returns:
        the list of sensors actually connected to the system

      • installDriver

        String installDriver(String driverPackageURL,
                   boolean replace)
        Installs a driver package (jar file) from the specified URL
        Parameters:
        driverPackageURL - URL of jar containing implementation of new driver
        replace - if true, an older version of the same driver will be replaced
        Returns:
        automatically assigned driver ID

      • uninstallDriver

        void uninstallDriver(String driverID)
        Uninstalls the driver with the specified ID
        Parameters:
        driverID -

      • getInstalledSensorDrivers

        List<IModuleProvider> getInstalledSensorDrivers()
        Returns:
        the list of all sensor drivers installed on the system
